projects: [{"title":"Text clustering - Numo_Uno","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Unsupervised Text Clustering and Topic Modeling • Applied feature engineering on the dataset of academic information of students in different fields. Preprocessed data using NLTK and Spacy • Used different word embeddings and different clustering algorithms for topic identification including (LDA) and (LSA) for topic modeling • Visualized clustered text data using word clouds for identification of different topics in text and their importance"},{"title":"Forecasting of Electrical Meter Readings of buildings in Delhi NCR","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Feb 2020","description":"Solution included an ensemble of time series approach and a supervised learning approach.• Analyzed data to map trends and seasonality for peak hours, festivals, seasons with useful graphs and plots.• Time series models used included ARIMA, CNN-LSTM, Vector Auto-Regression (VAR) and FB Prophet.• For the supervised learning approach, feature extraction was done considering factors like holidays, business hours, time ofday, season, etc, and the models deployed included Regression models, Random forest, Light GBM, XGBoost, etc."}]
